briefTitle: Sulfonylurea Add-on Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-035)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus with inadequate glycemic control

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in A1C at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Hemoglobin A1C (A1C) is measured as percent. Thus this change from baseline reflects the Week 24 A1C percent minus the Week 0 A1C percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in FPG at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: The change from baseline is the Week 24 Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) minus the Week 0 FPG.
